Package com.mimecast.robin.storage

Class LmtpConnectionPool

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.storage.LmtpConnectionPool
public class LmtpConnectionPool extends Object
Connection pool for LMTP deliveries with actual connection reuse.

Unlike a semaphore-based rate limiter, this pool maintains actual TCP connections to the LMTP server and reuses them across multiple email deliveries. This eliminates the overhead of TCP connection establishment and LHLO handshake for each email.

Pool lifecycle:

  • borrow() - get an idle connection or create a new one (up to maxSize)
  • return() - reset the connection state (RSET) and return to idle queue
  • invalidate() - close the connection without returning to pool

  • Constructor Details

    • LmtpConnectionPool

      public LmtpConnectionPool(int maxSize, long borrowTimeoutSeconds, long idleTimeoutSeconds, long maxLifetimeSeconds, List<String> servers, int port, boolean tls)
      Creates an LMTP connection pool.
      Parameters:
      maxSize - Maximum number of connections in the pool.
      borrowTimeoutSeconds - Maximum time to wait when borrowing a connection.
      idleTimeoutSeconds - Close idle connections after this many seconds.
      maxLifetimeSeconds - Close connections after this many seconds regardless of activity.
      servers - List of LMTP server addresses.
      port - LMTP server port.
      tls - Whether to use TLS.

  • Method Details

    • borrow

      public LmtpConnectionPool.PooledLmtpConnection borrow(MessageEnvelope envelope)
      Borrows a connection from the pool.

      First tries to get an idle connection. If none available and under max size, creates a new connection. If at max size, waits for an idle connection.

      Parameters:
      envelope - The envelope to deliver (used to set up fresh session).
      Returns:
      A pooled connection ready for use, or null if timeout/failure.

    • returnConnection

      public void returnConnection(LmtpConnectionPool.PooledLmtpConnection pooled)
      Returns a connection to the pool after successful use.

      Sends RSET to clear the session state and returns to idle queue.

      Parameters:
      pooled - The connection to return.

    • invalidate

      public void invalidate(LmtpConnectionPool.PooledLmtpConnection pooled)
      Invalidates a connection (used after delivery failure).

      Closes the connection without returning it to the pool.

      Parameters:
      pooled - The connection to invalidate.
